response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product is worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I would like to offer you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $13,500. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 13500}
